original: Saraṇaṁ dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nadassanena pahātabbahetuko
analyzed: ▁saraṇ aṃ ▁dassanena ▁pahātabbahetuk aṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁n asaraṇ o ▁na dassan ena ▁pahātabbahetuk o

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… sahajāte tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
Saraṇaṁ bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko
dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… sahajāte tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
Araṇaṁ nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naaraṇo nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
